zoom0

public void zoom0()
Description copied from interface: BasicPanel
sets the zoomlevel to a value so that the image can be shown full. If the image size is smaller than the paint able area the image is drawn normally. If the image size is greater than the paint able area the image is drawn as small as needed to fit in the panel

Specified by:
zoom0 in interface BasicPanel
